pageSetting.title: 客户存贷款所属行业分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'ZHLX'
select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'KHLX'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT $tjrq$ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, JG.JGMC AS JGMC, B.KHS AS HZKHS, (cast(B.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast( SUM(SSHY.KHS) OVER(PARTITION BY SSHY.TJRQ,SSHY.JXDXLX,SSHY.KHLX)as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZQHZB, dmms.dmms as dmms, dmms.dmz as dmz, SSHY.KHS AS KHS, case when b.khs = 0 then 0 else (cast(SSHY.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast( b.khs as decimal(25,4)))*100 end as zb FROM KHFX_KHSSHYTJ SSHY INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = SSHY.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN( select CAST(sum(a.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs,a.jgkhdxdh from ( SELECT SSHY1.KHS ,SSHY1.JGKHDXDH FROM KHFX_KHSSHYTJ SSHY1 where SSHY1.TJRQ =(SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND SSHY1.JXDXLX=$ywlx$ AND SSHY1.KHLX='$khlx$' AND SSHY1.JGKHDXDH IN($jgkhdxdh$) )A GROUP BY A.JGKHDXDH )B ON SSHY.JGKHDXDH = B.JGKHDXDH inner join CSB_DMMS dmms on dmms.dmmc='KHHYLB' and SSHY.KHHYLB = DMMS.DMZ WHERE SSHY.TJRQ =(SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND SSHY.JXDXLX=$ywlx$ AND SSHY.KHLX='$khlx$' AND SSHY.JGKHDXDH IN($jgkhdxdh$)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT $tjrq$ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, JG.JGMC AS JGMC, B.KHS AS HZKHS, (cast(B.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast( SUM(SSHY.KHS) OVER(PARTITION BY SSHY.TJRQ,SSHY.JXDXLX,SSHY.KHLX)as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZQHZB, dmms.dmms as dmms, dmms.dmz as dmz, SSHY.KHS AS KHS, case when b.khs = 0 then 0 else (cast(SSHY.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast( b.khs as decimal(25,4)))*100 end as zb FROM KHFX_KHSSHYTJ SSHY INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = SSHY.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN( select CAST(sum(a.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs,a.jgkhdxdh from ( SELECT SSHY1.KHS ,SSHY1.JGKHDXDH FROM KHFX_KHSSHYTJ SSHY1 where SSHY1.TJRQ =(SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND SSHY1.JXDXLX=$ywlx$ AND SSHY1.KHLX='$khlx$' AND SSHY1.JGKHDXDH IN($jgkhdxdh$) )A GROUP BY A.JGKHDXDH )B ON SSHY.JGKHDXDH = B.JGKHDXDH inner join CSB_DMMS dmms on dmms.dmmc='KHHYLB' and SSHY.KHHYLB = DMMS.DMZ WHERE SSHY.TJRQ =(SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND SSHY.JXDXLX=$ywlx$ AND SSHY.KHLX='$khlx$' AND SSHY.JGKHDXDH IN($jgkhdxdh$) ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'ZHLX'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'KHLX'
